SEARCH
Module com.cab302.cab302project
Package com.cab302.cab302project.model.session

Class SqliteSessionDAO

java.lang.Object
com.cab302.cab302project.model.session.SqliteSessionDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISessionDAO
public class SqliteSessionDAO extends Object implements ISessionDAO
DAO implementation for managing sessions using SQLite database. This class handles creating, ending sessions, and managing session results.

  • Method Details

    • createSession

      public void createSession(Session session)
      Creates a new session in the database.
      Specified by:
      createSession in interface ISessionDAO
      Parameters:
      session - The Session object containing details for the new session. Note: This method will set the test mode of the session.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an error occurs during session creation.

    • endSession

      public void endSession(Session session)
      Ends an existing session by updating its end time and finished status.
      Specified by:
      endSession in interface ISessionDAO
      Parameters:
      session - The Session object containing updated details for the session. Note: This method will set the end date time and session finished flag.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an error occurs during session ending.

    • createSessionResult

      public void createSessionResult(SessionResults sessionResults)
      Creates a new session result entry in the database.
      Specified by:
      createSessionResult in interface ISessionDAO
      Parameters:
      sessionResults - The SessionResults object containing details for the result. Note: This object must already have an ID assigned.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an error occurs during creation of the session result.

    • sessionResultCardCorrect

      public void sessionResultCardCorrect(SessionResults sessionResults, LocalDateTime startTime, LocalDateTime endTime)
      Updates a session result to mark the card as correct, setting the time taken to answer.
      Specified by:
      sessionResultCardCorrect in interface ISessionDAO
      Parameters:
      sessionResults - The SessionResults object containing updated result details.
      startTime - The start time of the session when the card was answered.
      endTime - The end time of the session when the card was answered.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an error occurs during update of the session result.

    • sessionResultCardIncorrect

      public void sessionResultCardIncorrect(SessionResults sessionResults, LocalDateTime startTime, LocalDateTime endTime)
      Updates a session result to mark the card as incorrect, setting the time taken to answer.
      Specified by:
      sessionResultCardIncorrect in interface ISessionDAO
      Parameters:

      startTime - The start time of the session when the card was answered.
      endTime - The end time of the session when the card was answered.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an error occurs during update of the session result.
